title: Antibiotic resistances spread faster than thought, aquaculture study reveals

title_detail.value: Antibiotic resistances spread faster than thought, aquaculture study reveals

summary: By studying fish raised in aquaculture, researchers have shed new light on the mechanisms by which antibiotic resistance genes are transferred between bacteria. According to their study, those mechanisms are more varied than previously thought.

summary_detail.value: By studying fish raised in aquaculture, researchers have shed new light on the mechanisms by which antibiotic resistance genes are transferred between bacteria. According to their study, those mechanisms are more varied than previously thought.
